alert.note: Alert for Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 10:52PM MDT until March 22 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
